Passive.Name: The Fun Gang
Passive.Description: When On The Same Team With Ralsei And Susie, Kris will deal +125% Damage

Passive.Name: Rude Buster
Passive.Description: Every 3rd Attack Deals 2x Damage. +50% Damage If On The Same Team As Lightworld/Darkworld Noelle.

Passive.Name: Dark Prince Magic
Passive.Description: All Towers In Range Of This Unit Are Given A +15% Range Boost (30% If Shiny)

Passive.Name: Sweet Ride
Passive.Description: Every 10s Lancer Summons a clone of his bike that deals 500 damage every 0.25 seconds (Max 5 On Field), with health being 2x of lancers current damage.

Passive.Name: Snowgrave
Passive.Description: Every 30s Noelles Next 3 Attacks Will Stun For 2.5 seconds, Dealing x5 Damage To Each Enemy

Passive.Name: Travelers... Would You Like A Gift...?
Passive.Description: All Towers In Range Of Seam are Given a +50% Cash Boost, Seam will also generate 1000->1500 cash every wave.

Passive.Name: Go forth!! My Squeakie Duckie!!
Passive.Description: Every 25s Rouxls Kaard will explode a random enemy with the thrash machine, Dealing x5 Of His Current Damage To it and dealing x2 damage to all enemies near the explosion

Passive.Name: Dance Party
Passive.Description: Every 15s Sweet Cap'n Cakes will throw a dance party, stunning all enemies in range for 2.5s

Passive.Name: JUST GIVE ME YOUR [[HeartShapedObject]]!!
Passive.Description: Spamton Will Deal 10x Single Damage To A Random Enemy In His Range Every 30s.

Passive.Name: Queen's Mansion
Passive.Description: Swatch Gives All Towers In Range A +25% Damage Boost, and Generates 5000->10000 Cash Every Wave.

Passive.Name: Training Manual
Passive.Description: Ralseis Dummy Hugs Enemies Dealing 2x Extra Damage Every 3rd Attack, Attacks Slow By 25% For 1 Second

Passive.Name: Order! Order!
Passive.Description: Attacks Stun Enemies for 0.5 Seconds, chaining up to 15 nearby enemies.

Passive.Name: Two heads are better than one! Three... maybe not.
Passive.Description: Attacks Hit 3 times.

Passive.Name: Circut Malfunction
Passive.Description: Every 10s Werewire Places A Glitched Trap That Deals x25 Damage To The First Enemy To Walk On It, Also Dealing 1s Darkened Stun. Trap Cooldown Cannot Be Changed. (Max 100 Traps On Field)

Passive.Name: Computer Virus
Passive.Description: All Towers In Range Of This Unit Are Given A +10% Damage Boost (20% If Shiny), and Enemies In Range Are Given 5% Soul Leak (10% If Shiny)

Passive.Name: Aggressive Anti-Virus
Passive.Description: Enemies Hit by Ambyu-Lance are given 45% Slow

Passive.Name: Criminal Virus
Passive.Description: Attacks Apply 25% Slow

Passive.Name: meowowow meowowow meowowow meowowow
Passive.Description: Enemies Hit by Tasque are given 5% SoulLeak For 1s.

Passive.Name: Warmify
Passive.Description: Swatchling Deals 50% Burn Damage Over 3 Seconds, 100% Burn Damage If Swatch Is On The Same Team.

Passive.Name: Broken Free From Their Control
Passive.Description: Attacks Chain Up to 5 Nearby Enemies, giving them 50% Slow for 2.5 seconds.

Passive.Name: Bake Sale
Passive.Description: All Towers In Range Of Rudinn are Given a +25% Cash Boost.

Passive.Name: What? Only a Support Unit!?
Passive.Description: All Towers In Range Of This Unit Are Given A +20% Damage Boost (40% If Shiny).

Passive.Name: Checker Dance
Passive.Description: K. Round's Attacks Deal 3x More Damage To Enemies With 20% Or Less Health. Does Not Effect Bosses/Mini-Bosses.

Passive.Name: Blown Away!
Passive.Description: Rabbick gives all towers in range a +10% Damage Boost (20% If Shiny) and a +5% CoolDown Reduction (10% If Shiny).

Passive.Name: CHAOS! CHAOS!
Passive.Description: Jevils Attacks Instantly Kill Enemies With 25% or Less Health, and Bosses with 10% Or Less Health

Passive.Name: I'M THE BAD GUY!!!
Passive.Description: All CH1 Towers In Range Of King Are Given A +32.5% Damage Boost (65% If Shiny), and Enemies Hit by King Are Given 10% SoulLeak (20% If Shiny)

Passive.Name: Study Buddies
Passive.Description: Berdly Deals +50% More Damage if paired with Noelle. +250% Damage If Paired With Noelle, Kris, And Susie.

Spamton NEO.VoiceLinePlaceCaptions: LOOKS LIKE YOU NEED A [[BIG SHOT]]!

Passive.Name: [[BIGGER AND BETTER THAN EVER!!]]
Passive.Description: Every 30s Spamton NEO Becomes Enraged, Dealing 3x More Damage For 10s And Making Attacks Apply 3s Darkened Stun.

Passive.Name: It's Just A Duck?
Passive.Description: Attacks Apply 100% Anti-Regen For 10 Seconds, and Enemies Hit by Thrash Machine are given 40% Slow for 3 seconds.

Passive.Name: CatchX
Passive.Description: Attacks Trap Enemies Stunning Them For 0.1 Seconds.

Passive.Name: Serial Number: Q5U4EX7YY2E9N
Passive.Description: Every 15s Queen Throws A Puddle Of Acid From Her Cup At A Random Enemy, Dealing 2x Of Her Damage In Splash, Applying 100% Darkness To Effected Enemies For 5s

Passive.Name: Saxophone
Passive.Description: For Every Enemy In Range of Shadowguy, Increase Damage by 5% (Max 50%)

Passive.Name: Pose For The Camera!
Passive.Description: Attacks Stun Enemies for 1 second.

Passive.Name: The Weather Always Sticks Together.
Passive.Description: Lanino Does +100% Damage If Paired With Elnina, and +250% Damage If Paired With Elnina And Rouxls Kaard.

Passive.Name: The Weather Always Sticks Together.
Passive.Description: Elnina Does +50% Damage If Paired With Lanino, and +150% Damage If Paired With Lanino And Rouxls Kaard.

Passive.Name: Turn Off
Passive.Description: Enemys Hit By Zapper Are Given 25% Slow For 2 Seconds And 0.1s Stun.

Passive.Name: Metaphysical Challenge
Passive.Description: Every 15s, Picks The Strongest Enemy In Tenna's range And Traps Them In A Ball Dealing Darkened Stun For 3s, And Dealing x10 Damage To Them. Excludes Bosses/Mini-Bosses.

Passive.Name: Card Reader
Passive.Description: Attacks Deal 2x More Damage If Theres More Than 10 Enemies In Range.

Passive.Name: Gerson's Wisdom
Passive.Description: Im Old!

Passive.Name: Glory. Glory.
Passive.Description: Every Attack Miss Mizzle has a 10% Chance To Use a BitterTear Stunning All Enemies In Range For 5 Seconds, and Dealing 250% of Miss Mizzle's Damage in Darkness.

Passive.Name: Mist
Passive.Description: Mizzle Deals +25% Damage For Every Miss Mizzle Or WaterCooler In Range (Max 100%)

Passive.Name: Mysterious Ringing
Passive.Description: All Towers In Range Are Given a 15% Cooldown Reduction (30% If Shiny)

Passive.Name: Suddenly, the north and east winds blew fiercely.
Passive.Description: Every 5s The Roaring Knight Picks The Currently Targeted Enemy And Instantly Kills Them (x50 Damage & 3s Darkened Stun To Bosses & Mini-Bosses).

Passive.Name: The Last Guardian Of The Sanctuary.
Passive.Description: Attacks Apply 25% SoulLeak For 5 Seconds. Every 60 Seconds, The Titan Will Charge Up His Eye Beam For 3s And Deal 3x His Current Damage Every 0.25 For 5s As Pierce, The Titan Can Not Attack While Charging Up And Using His Eye Beam.

Passive.Name: The Tail Of Hell Begins To Crawl...
Passive.Description: Enemies Hit By IMAGE_FRIEND Are Given 65% Slow For 3 Seconds.

Watercooler.Type: AOE + Damage, Range And Cooldown Booster

Passive.Name: The Scent Of Mist Emits From Nearby
Passive.Description: All Towers In Range Are Given 15% Damage Boost (30% If Shiny), 15% Range Boost (30% If Shiny), and 5% Cooldown Reduction. (10% If Shiny)

Passive.Name: Butterscotch Cinnamon Pie
Passive.Description: All Towers In Range Are Given A 25% Damage Boost (50% If Shiny)

Passive.Name: Holiday Season
Passive.Description: All Enemies In Range Are Slowed by 65%.

Passive.Name: STOP! POLICE!
Passive.Description: Enemies Hit By Undyne Are Slowed by 50%.

Passive.Name: Toby Is That You?
Passive.Description: All Towers In Range Are Given A 30% Damage Boost (60% Shiny), And A 15% Cooldown Reduction (30% Shiny)

Passive.Name: Asgore Found Freedom In His Heartache
Passive.Description: Every Third Attack Deals 2x Damage And Applies 15% SoulLeak And 50% Slow.

Passive.Name: Asriel II
Passive.Description: All Towers In Range Of Onion are Given a +25% Range Boost. (50% Shiny)

Passive.Name: Are Things Getting Hot In Here?

Passive.Name: Huh-hah! Let's feel my technique!
Passive.Description: Attacks Give Enemies 25% Slow For 3 Seconds And 1 Second of Stun

Passive.Description: Attacks Stun Enemies For 1 Second. Every 3rd Attack, Giga Queen Throws a Comically Large Baseball That Does x15 Splash Damage And 100% Anti-Regen.

Hammer Of Justice.VoiceLinePlaceCaptions: Gyaa! Ha Ha! Is that all you got kid?

Passive.Name: Dual Buster
Passive.Description: Gains +0.5% Damage For Every 1 Health Lost From Your Base. Every 3rd Attack Breaks All Armor/Defense On Hit Enemies And Deals 2x Damage.

Passive.Description: Asriel Deals 100% More Damage If Paired With Dess Or Any Dreemurr Family Unit.

Passive.Name: VERY VERY INTERESTING...
Passive.Description: Every 30 Seconds (Global Cooldown) Gaster Will Summon A Fountain At A Random Exit for 5 Seconds, Causing enemies that walk into it To Teleport Back To Their Original Entrance With 50% Of Their Health Removed.

Dess.VoiceLinePlaceCaptions: Heh, I’m here to cause some chaos!

Passive.Description: Enemies (20 -> 10) Mini-Bosses (50 -> 25) And Bosses (100 -> 50) Do 50% Less Damage When Reaching The Exit.

Passive.Description: Small Mike Will Deal 50% More Damage If Paired With Any Other Mike, 100% If Paired With Both Other Mikes.

Passive.Name: Give Me My Q's!
Passive.Description: All Towers In Range Are Given A 20% Damage Boost (40% If Shiny), 20% Range Boost (40% If Shiny), and 10% Cooldown Reduction. (20% If Shiny)

Passive.Description: Cat Mike Will Deal 50% More Damage If Paired With Any Other Mike, 100% If Paired With Both Other Mikes.

Passive.Name: Dodge!

Passive.Description: Every 3rd Attack Deals x4 Damage And Applies 60% Slow For 3 Seconds.

Passive.Name: IT'S TV TIME!

Passive.Description: Kris Deals +50% Damage if Paired With Any Lightworld Troops

Passive.Description: Deals +25% More Damage For The First 5 Rounds Of Placement

Titan Ralsei.VoiceLinePlaceCaptions: I’ll protect you… even like this!
Titan Ralsei.VoiceLineSellCaptions: I… can’t hold this form forever.

Passive.Name: A Dark.. Dark... Dark.. Prince Has Awoken...
Passive.Description: Attacks Apply 20% SoulLeak For 3 Seconds And 50% Regen For 3 Seconds. Attacks Also Apply 0.5s Stun. Stabs Into The Ground Every 30s Creating A Dark Fountain Dealing x5 AOE Damage To All Enemies In Range. (Voice Actor: SnowzBunz)

Passive.Name: SCARED OF A LITTLE [Change of perspective?]
Passive.Description: Every 5th Attack Perrys A Single Enemy Hit, Turning Them Around With 25% Of Their Health Restored And Making Them Walk Towards The Closet Entrance. (Perrys Do x10 Damage To Bosses)

Passive.Name: The Atomic Roar Of Darkness And Annihilation
Passive.Description: Susiezilla Charges Her Beam For 5s Causing A Pierce Beam Dealing 2x Her Current Damage In Darkness Every 0.25s For 5s. 45s Recharge.

Passive.Name: The Upper Hand
Passive.Description: Every 60s HANDROMEDA Drops Stars From The Sky Dealing an 5x AOE Attack To All Enemies In Range.

Passive.Name: The Deals Revolving
Passive.Description: Spamton Applies 50% Darkness For 1s And 50% Slow To All Enemies In Range, While Jevil Does A 5x AOE Attack Every 30s That Deals 10% SoulLeak For 5s.

Passive.Name: Mama Miba! Mama SHIBA!
Passive.Description: Attacks Apply 100% Burn For 1 Second

Passive.Name: A Fathers Love
Passive.Description: Rudolph Holiday Boosts All Units Damage In Range By 25% (50% Shiny) And Does 10% AOE SoulLeak

Passive.Name: The Frozen Heart
Passive.Description: Noelles Damage And Slow Amount Ramp Up Based On More Enemies In Range, With A Minimum Of 1x More Damage And 50% Slow, Up to 2.5x More Damage And 70% Slow At 15+ Enemies.

Passive.Name: Welcome to the Hall Of Fame!
Passive.Description: Attacks Apply 0.5s Stun, Every 30s Tophat Tenna Adds A random enemy to the hall of fame, Causing Them To Take 2x More Damage For Their Entire Life Duration

Passive.Name: It Pulls The Strings And Makes Them Ring
Passive.Description: All Enemies In Range Are Slowed By 60%. The Phone Rings every 10s, Dealing 3s Stun. (Voice Actor: -)

Passive.Name: Cat Got Your Tail?
Passive.Description: Attacks Stun For 0.5s, 50% Slow Is Applied If Paired With Bratty

Passive.Name: An ancient aromancer, it generates magic incense and stores it in its steel shell.
Passive.Description: Attacks Apply 100% Darkness for 1 second.

Passive.Name: A worldly wizard that casts spells by spelling. Unfortunately prone to typos.
Passive.Description: 50% Chance For Attacks To Completely Remove Anti-Magic, Anti-Slow, Anti-Bleed, Anti-Stun, Armor, Shielded Defense And Anti-SoulLeak On Hit Enemies.

Winglade.VoiceLinePlaceCaptions: Wings of steel, blades of fate.

Passive.Name: A radical blade with feathers at the hilt.
Passive.Description: Attacks Apply 65% Slow For 3s, When Hitting an air enemy, Winglade deals 2x damage and turns them into a ground enemy.

Passive.Name: This guy just loves dancing so much it slows everyone around him!
Passive.Description: Attacks Apply 30% Slow For 3 Seconds.

Passive.Description: Attacks Stun For 1s

Passive.Name: A True Flashy Salesman! Not a trashy Bigshot.
Passive.Description: All units in range are given a 20% (40% Shiny) Damage Boost.

Passive.Name: Welcome To Spamtons BIGSHOT Auto Repairs! BUY NOW BUY NOW!!

Passive.Name: Do you remember this kids name? Seriously i can't remember!

Passive.Description: Attacks Apply 80% Slow For 1 Second.

Passive.Name: Everyone Loves Nice Cream!
Passive.Description: Attacks Apply 60% Slow For 2 Seconds.

Passive.Name: Wrong Enemy !?
Passive.Description: Spawns Two Drawing Turrets That Deal The Units Current Damage In Single Target Every 0.5 Seconds. Every 25s Draws a Random Picture Of An Enemy, summoning them to the field at a random exit with x15 of their damage becoming the summoned units health.

Passive.Name: The Spear Of Justice
Passive.Description: Attacks Apply 100% Anti-Regen For 5s, Deals 2x Damage And 1s Stun if Paired With Hammer of Justice.

Passive.Name: Candy Canes
Passive.Description: Attacks Apply 50% Slow To Enemies, Deals 2x Damage If Paired With Any Christmas Units.

Passive.Name: Festive Cake Bombs
Passive.Description: Every 15s Santa Ralsei Will Throw A Festive Cake Bomb That Deals 5x Its Damage In Nuke With 200% Burn Over 1 Second.

Passive.Name: Festive Supplies
Passive.Description: Attacks Stun Enemys For 0.5s By Wrapping Them In Gift Boxes.

Passive.Name: Krismas Tree... Get It! Kris Mas! - From Noelle
Passive.Description: Attacks Apply 75% Anti-Regen For 1s.

Passive.Name: Here to Ruin Your Christmas!
Passive.Description: Steals 25% Of The Currently Targeted Enemy's Health Every 3s

Passive.Name: HoHoHo! Im Even Uglier Than Before!
Passive.Description: Attacks Slow By 40% For 3s

Passive.Name: Christmas In Home Town
Passive.Description: Noelle Throws Presents Out Of Her Sleigh Every 15s Dealing x10 Splash Damage And 1s Stun.

Christmas Misfits.VoiceLinePlaceCaptions: You Wont Stop Us! Right Noelle?

Passive.Name: Can We Stand Under The MistleToe Instead?
Passive.Description: Susie Carries Noelle On Her Shoulder, Allowing Noelle To Mimic Susies Damage In Splash Every 2s

Passive.Name: Im Totally Santa! See Look At My Huge Bag!
Passive.Description: Mall Santa Queen Hurls Coal From Her Present, Dealing 5x Damage And 3s Stun Every 20s.

Passive.Name: Delivering Presents & Flowers, While Eating Cookies And Drinking Milk.
Passive.Description: Santa Asgore Has A 50/50 Chance To Either Apply 10% SoulLeak Or 100% Darkness Every Other Attack.

Passive.Name: Would You Like a Christmas Flavored Pie? Straight To The Face?
Passive.Description: Mrs. Claus Toriel Hurls A Christmas Pie At Her Enemies Every 30s, Dealing 2x Damage And 50% Burn For 2s.

Passive.Name: Festive Buster
Passive.Description: Every 3rd Attack Santa Susie Uses Festive Buster Dealing 3x Damage.

Passive.Name: Togore Tastic
Passive.Description: Togore Mimics The Nearest Units Damage Every 5s, Dealing It On His Next Attack Alongside His Own.

Passive.Name: Test
Passive.Description: Attacks Make Enemys Say "HIT SUCCESS" Above Them
